properties.address: Crossfield Garage, Cleator Moor, Cumbria CA25 5QA
properties.description: West Lakes Hemp Coffeeshop: A Neurodiversity Hub and Community Space Nestled in the heart of Cumbria, West Lakes Hemp Company offers more than just a cup of coffee. It's a vibrant community space where warmth and laughter are brewed alongside our unique CBD-infused beverages. Our Coffeeshop, renowned for its cozy, welcoming atmosphere, is a popular gathering spot for locals and visitors alike. We're proud to be more than just a coffee shop. As an active participant in community welfare, we run several projects reflecting our commitment to social responsibility: **Women's Period Poverty Collection Point:** - We believe in supporting those in need. Our collection point for menstrual products helps address period poverty in our community, ensuring everyone has access to essential hygiene products. **Suspended Coffee Scheme:** Inspired by the tradition of "caffe sospeso," we embrace the spirit of paying it forward. Customers can purchase an extra coffee, which we 'suspend' for someone in need â€“ a simple gesture that warms hearts and uplifts spirits. **ADHD Cumbria Hub:** Understanding the unique challenges faced by individuals with ADHD, our coffee shop doubles as a hub for ADHD Cumbria. Here, we provide a supportive space for sharing experiences, accessing resources, and building a supportive community. At West Lakes Hemp Company, we're more than a business; we're a part of the community fabric, dedicated to making a positive impact. Join us for a coffee and be part of our mission to make the world a little brighter & a little greener, one leaf at a time.
properties.title: West Lakes Hemp Coffeeshop
